resources.string: Auto matching of network album info
Reduce flowing light rendering effect to improve flowing light rendering performance
This setting ignores system media library covers, which can improve cover quality and support different covers for the same album, possibly slowing down loading

‚ùóPlease understand your device carefully before changing the above Settings, the changes will take effect after switching songs, too high the player initial sampling rate setting may cause serious resource waste and power consumption
‚ùóNetwork matching cannot be completely matched, do not give feedback

Use PEAKEQ parameter equalizer to avoid the problem that the fixed frequency (graphic) equalizer is difficult to compensate the narrow gap and peak value between the two frequency bands. Restore the precise parameters from AutoEq library to bring you a perfect listening feeling. It is recommended to use it with headphones.
The following values will be restored to default, and the software will automatically restart after restoration (modifications related to some audio settings will take effect after switching songs)
Simultaneous playback with other Apps (audio focus), output mode, sample rate, decoding, DSD, DSP, etc

Number of characters is too long

Read the audio file in the shared storage (not including the reading of photos and videos, if it is included in the System request description, it is a unified description because Android 12 and the following systems have not subdivided permissions), and obtain the ANDROID MEDIA STORE audio file information after authorization. If there is no system authorization inquiry after agreeing to this conversation, it may be that the permission of this App has been set to \"reject and no longer prompt\". Please manually go to the system settings to change it
‚ö†Ô∏è Enabling this function will automatically turn off the [System Level Status Bar Lyrics] function to ensure that the media notification cover is normal
Automatically disrupt the random play queue

The App uses the native file manager to authorize folders
1. Check whether the native file manager is disabled (the specific name may be different on different OEM systems, and the package name is unique: com.google.android.documentsui)
2. It may be that the native file manager (DocumentsUI, built-in application of Android system) has been selectively replaced by the original equipment manufacturer (OEM), which is mostly found in some car equipment
* Native File Manager can accept patches in Google Play Store
Audio focus is occupied by other App
The local music player chosen by hundreds of thousands of users
Additional Pro features are found across the settings screen, check the specific category screen for details
